Key Features:
Send Transactions: Effortlessly send and receive transactions with just a few clicks. Our intuitive interface ensures that managing your digital assets is both simple and secure.

Staking: Maximize your holdings by participating in staking directly from the extension. Enjoy the benefits of staking without leaving your browser.

Why Choose Torch Wallet?
